testcase.classname: US1800- There should be a page where Order Details can be seen
testcase.name: 1806- Functions of Cancel Order button
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "myUrl"........................................passed Then User clicks on the login link, enters "mail" and "password" and logs in..passed Then User clicks on dashboard link..........................................passed Then User clicks My Order section on dashboard page.........................passed Then User verifies that the Reason box and Send button are available when the Cancel Order button on the Order Details page is pressed.passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed
